simulated_missions.comment: Primary (0,0,10)-(100,0,10) active 14:00-14:10 (reaches (80,0,10) at 14:08). Simulated (70,-20,10)-(90,20,10) with waypoints timestamped 14:05 & 14:11 (reaches (80,0,10) at 14:08). Paths intersect in a 'weird' way, speeds differ, mission times overlap, and drones CRASH. This is a spatio-temporal conflict.
